title: At Work
description: Improve your French speaking skills with phrases commonly used at work. Focus on clear pronunciation and professional intonation.
instructions: Below, you'll find a list of common phrases you might use in a work environment in French.
Your task is to record yourself speaking each phrase.
Ensure your pronunciation matches the provided text as closely as possible.
Try to maintain a natural and clear speaking pace.
After recording each phrase, listen to your recording and compare it to the text.
Focus on intonation, clarity, and fluency.
Repeat the recording process as many times as needed to improve your pronunciation.

items.question: J'ai une réunion à 10 heures du matin.
items.answer: J'ai une réunion à 10 heures du matin.

items.question: Où se trouve la salle de conférence ?
items.answer: Où se trouve la salle de conférence ?

items.question: Je vais vous envoyer un e-mail.
items.answer: Je vais vous envoyer un e-mail.

scoring.8-10 correct pronunciations: Excellent! Your pronunciation is clear and accurate. You demonstrate a strong command of work-related French.
scoring.5-7 correct pronunciations: Good! Your pronunciation is mostly correct, with a good grasp of professional phrases in French. There are some areas to refine for improved clarity.
scoring.2-4 correct pronunciations: Fair. You can navigate basic conversations at work in French, but there are several areas needing significant improvement.
scoring.0-1 correct pronunciations: Needs improvement. Consider practicing more to enhance your French pronunciation skills, or seek additional resources for learning.
